data.actual_result: Timer freezes until the channel loads
data.expected_result: Timer keeps moving while the channel loads
data.short_description: Switching to an unloaded channel while an in-app notification is present freezes the timer until the channel loads
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you can receive in-app notifications - Have someone DM you or mention you - Switch to a channel you haven’t loaded and observe the in-app notification timer
